item.title: Lateral Movement via WMI and Threat Hunting Techniques Part 1
item.description:
What is Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI)?

WMI in Windows provides numerous software tools for managing and controlling Windows systems and devices, including hardware information, software data, and system status that can be checked using this tool. WMI communicates through various protocols and allows applications to retrieve and manage the information they need from the system. Itâ€™s worth noting that WMI is based on the COM/ DCOM protocol.
